p: Liver cancer HCAM cells (Provided by Iraqi national center for cancer researches, University of Al-Mustansriah, Baghdad, Iraq) were maintained in 10 cm plate contained RPMI-1640 upplemented with 10% FBS, 100 units/ml penicillin and 100 μg/ml streptomycin at 37°C in a humidified atmosphere with 5% CO2.
